angle.headline: Exclusive: Security Perimeter Expansion Includes Real-Time Drone Monitoring
angle.angle: My sources reveal that the expanded security perimeter for Super Bowl LX will incorporate real-time drone monitoring. This advanced surveillance system will provide comprehensive aerial views of the stadium and surrounding areas, feeding directly into a unified command center. Expect increased security presence and heightened vigilance.
angle.topic: Super Bowl 60 Security and Logistical Preparations in the Bay Area
